sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LETTER TO SHAREOWNERS   FROM OUR BOARD OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Directors, we remain accountable to shareowners   through a variety of ever-improving governance practices   that are informed by our ongoing engagement with shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareowner:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your investment in The Coca-Cola Company  and for trusting us to oversee your interests in this  business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your Board understands that it is elected by  you, the shareowners, to oversee the long-term health  and overall success of our Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Directors, we  remain accountable to shareowners through a variety of  ever-improving governance practices that are informed  by our ongoing engagement with shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please  see Governance, including the message from our Lead  Independent Director Sam Nunn, beginning on page 13.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Chief Executive Officer Succession
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One of your Boards most important responsibilities is to  ensure an orderly and stable CEO succession process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To  that end, in December 2016, we unanimously approved  a new leadership structure for the Company under which  Company veteran James Quincey, currently President and  Chief Operating Officer, will succeed Muhtar Kent as CEO,  effective May 1, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board has nominated  James to stand for election as a Director at the 2017 Annual
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LETTER TO SHAREOWNERS FROM OUR BOARD OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meeting of Shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Muhtar will continue to serve as  CEO until May 1, 2017, and then will continue as Chairman  of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: is critical to a forward-looking and strategic Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ensuring  diverse perspectives, including a mix of skills, experience  and backgrounds, and healthy turnover are also key  to representing the interests of shareowners effectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2009, eight new Directors have been elected and  we have one new Director nominee for 2017; we have  had a full rotation of Board committee chairs; we elected  a new Lead Independent Director; and we expanded  diversity representation on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These benchmarks  are just a snapshot in time, but we believe they signal our  commitment to Board refreshment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This CEO succession plan reinforces our belief in the strength of the Companys leadership team and underscores our confidence in James as the Companys next long-term leader.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Importantly, this transition maintains the successful partnership between Muhtar and James into 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are fortunate to have two executives with the talent and experience of Muhtar and James to lead your Board and Company, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This transition comes at an important time, as we are  overseeing the Companys strategy to refocus on our  core business model of building strong global brands,  enhancing sustainable customer value and leading a  strong, dedicated franchise system.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This transformation  is well under way, and we, along with management, are  optimistic about the future of the business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareowner Engagement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As always, a priority for this Board is listening to the views  of our shareowners and considering these views as we  make decisions in the boardroom.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We accomplish this  through robust outreach and engagement with you, the  owners of this Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Partnering with management,  we engage with shareowners throughout the year on a  variety of topics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Composition
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please continue to share your thoughts or concerns at any time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have established a process to facilitate communication by shareowners with the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see Communicate with the Board on page 33.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Just as effective management succession is essential to the  Companys success, we view Board succession planning  in the same way.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continually focus on ensuring that  the Board is composed of high-integrity, highly capable  Directors to represent the long-term interests of shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Refreshing our Board with new perspectives and new ideas
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As always, thank you for the trust that you have placed in us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March9, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: David B.  Weinberg   Herbert A.  Allen Ronald W.  Allen   Ana   Botn Marc  Bolland Howard G.  Buffett Richard M.  Daley Helene D.  Gayle Marc  David B Alexis M.  Herman Maria Elena  Lagomasino Sam   Nunn Robert A.  Kotick Barry  Diller Muhtar   Kent
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Note: Howard G. Buffett (pictured) is not standing for election at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James Quincey (not pictured) has been nominated for election as a Director at the 2017 Annual Meetin
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement    3
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q&A WITH OUR CHAIRMAN AND CEO
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Throughout the year, we engage  with shareowners on a variety of  topics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Here are answers to a few  commonly raised questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Muhtar Kent Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer  The Coca-Cola Company
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Could you talk about The Coca-Cola Companys  performance in 2016?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the refranchising of Company-owned bottling operations in the U.S.  by the end of 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In total, half of our global system revenue has  been in motion through our recent actions to strengthen the system.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The progress demonstrated by these actions is foundational in  positioning our system for prosperity long into the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we continued our journey to transform our Company to a  brand-centric organization leading a great franchise system.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We began  in late 2014, when we got behind a set of strategic actions designed  to invigorate growth and increase profitability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since then, weve  been advancing on a path to deliver greater long-term sustainable  value to our shareowners, associates, partners and stakeholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While we accomplished a lot in 2016, we know we have more  work to do.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the year ahead, we will be focused on building and  expanding our portfolio of consumer-centric drinks, including those  with less sugar and calories, further evolving our approach to  growing revenues from our global sparkling soft drink portfolio, and  driving productivity through the organization to reduce complexity  and redirect resources to drive revenue growth in a world with fast- changing consumer patterns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 was a critical year, as we continued to make strong progress in  transforming our Company, while keeping focused on consumers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continued to gain momentum in building sustainable revenue  growth through segmented market roles and disciplined brand  investments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We strengthened our brands and portfolio through  better and more marketing, innovation and targeted acquisitions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We brought to market more than 500 new products, nearly 400 of  which were teas, juices, coffees, waters or other still beverages.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: And  we generated over $600 million in productivity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James Quincey will be your successor as CEO  effective May 1, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can you talk about this  leadership change?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One of the most meaningful legacies I can leave is a solid foundation  for James, my successor as CEO, to take this business successfully  into the next decade and beyond.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to delivering our profit target for the full year, I am  encouraged by the strategic actions taken during 2016 to strengthen  our global bottling system.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the fourth quarter of 2016, we reached  a definitive agreement to refranchise all Company-owned bottling  operations in China, and we took important steps to further the  evolution of Coca-Cola Beverages Africa.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the year, we  successfully completed the creation of Coca-Cola European Partners,  and we supported the ongoing transformation of the franchise  bottling system in Japan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: And last, we remain on track to complete
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I have worked closely with James during the past ten years of his  20 year career at the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has vast industry knowledge,  expertise with the Companys brands, values and global bottling  system and an acute understanding of evolving consumer tastes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James has the strategic vision and inspirational leadership to usher  in the next phase of growth for the Companys great business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement 4
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q&A WITH OUR CHAIRMAN AND CEO
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James is also passionate about developing people, building strong teams and creating winning cultures everywhere he has been.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I am confident he is the ideal person to effectively lead our Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You have commented recently about the  importance of gender diversity in the workplace  and on boards of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why do you believe  diversity is valuable?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As CEO, James will assume accountability for the Companys strategic  direction and operations, from setting the long-term strategy, to  leading our bottling system, to making portfolio and organizational  decisions, to driving long-term sustainable growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After May 1st, I will  continue to lead the Board of Directors and do everything possible  to create an environment that allows James to successfully run this  business and deliver long-term value for our shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I am convinced that we must do everything possible to promote  gender equality.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is simply good for business and for economic and  social progress around the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a business leader, I know our  Company cant reach its full potential unless we recruit, hire, develop  and retain women associates as part of a diverse, multicultural  workforce.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why has the Board decided to separate the roles  of Chairman and Chief Executive Officer and will  this separation of the roles be permanent?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: And I dont think we need academic studies to see why.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You just need  the simple logic that would tell you any organization is setting itself  up for failure if it isnt welcoming the experience and expertise of half  the worlds people.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That is why, at The Coca-Cola Company, weve  been on a journey to attract and retain more women employees  and leaders and more women on our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I recommended, and the Board agreed, that continuing the partnership  between James and myself, with an adjusted focus for each of us,  would enable us both to apply our strongest skills to continuing the  sustained growth of our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To put it simply, I will lead the Board  and focus on Board governance, and James will run the business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Weve made progress in recent years, but we are not satisfied.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Women  have gained significant ground, but we still have a long way to go  to achieve true gender equality.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We know we can do more, and we  are working on multiple fronts to do so.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described in our Corporate Governance Guidelines, the Board  has flexibility to decide whether to have the same person occupy the  offices of the Chairman of the Board and CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This structure allows  the Board to exercise its business judgment after considering relevant  factors, including the specific needs of the business and what is in  the best interests of the Companys shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What are your current sustainability focus  areas, and how are we progressing toward  our sustainability initiatives?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While sustainability is an integrated component of our business  strategy, over the past few years we have stepped up the Companys  progress on many social and environmental issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One example  is the 5by20 initiative to support the economic empowerment of    five million women entrepreneurs globally by 2020.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will continue to evaluate the Board leadership structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At least  one executive session of the non-management Directors each  year will include a review of the Boards leadership structure and  consideration of whether the position of the Chairman of the Board  should be held by the CEO or be separated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We remain focused on water stewardship and replenishment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For  example, last year we announced that, together with our bottling  partners, we met our goal to replenish at least 100% of the equivalent  amount of water we use in our finished beverage sales volume five  years earlier than our initial target.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While we are pleased with our  progress, we know our water stewardship work is unfinished and  remain focused on exploring additional steps to advance our water  programs and performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company and the industry continue to face  some significant challenges.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do you think  about these challenges and what strategies are  in place to handle them?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The changing consumer landscape will continue to be a key priority  as well as portfolio mix and performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are addressing evolving  consumer preferences by expanding product offerings, introducing  smaller package sizes, and most recently, working to reduce added  sugar in our products, with over 500 initiatives in progress.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also continue to create partnerships across the golden triangle  of business, government and civil society in order to successfully  address issues and leverage opportunities in communities where  we operate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I will add that this leadership transition comes at a time of important  evolution for our Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our journey to refocus on the Companys  core business model of building strong global brands, enhancing  sustainable customer value and leading a strong, dedicated franchise  system is well under way.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In all we do, our business tries to take the approach of staying  constructively discontent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were always encouraging our partners,  our colleagues and ourselves to achieve more, work more holistically  and be more efficient.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We look forward to continuing to share  progress on our sustainability journey.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can learn more about our  sustainability efforts at www.coca-colacompany.com/sustainability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James has been a major component of this evolution and is committed to continuing to build the long-term sustainability of the Company and the bottling system, from the health of our operations, to the health of our bottling partners, to the health of the communities we serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record Date:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors set February 27, 2017 as the record date for the  meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means that our shareowners as of the close of business  on that date are entitled to receive this notice of the meeting and vote at  the meeting and any adjournments or postponements of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the record date, there were 4,292,014,609 shares of common stock  of The Coca-Cola Company (the Company) issued and outstanding and  entitled to vote at the meeting.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you plan to attend the Annual Meeting in person, you must register
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See question 26 on page 89 for how to gain admission.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are unable to attend the meeting in person, you can listen to a live  audiocast of the meeting by visiting the 2017 Annual Meeting page of the  Companys website, at www.coca-colacompany.com/investors/annual- meeting-of-shareowners.

sentences.text: On the website, you can also vote through the  Internet, access the proxy materials, submit questions in advance and  learn more about our Company.

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement    7
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 PERFORMANCE AT A GLANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We Are Transforming Our Company
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we continued to focus and make progress on our five strategic initiatives: drive revenue growth through segmented market roles,  make disciplined brand and growth investments, drive efficiency through aggressive productivity, streamline and simplify, and focus on our  core business model.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Achievements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Expanded our operating margin through 3% price/mix growth and balancing productivity with disciplined investments
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advanced our strategy to grow revenues in our sparkling  portfolio, through actions including the Coca-Cola one-brand  strategy and an integrated marketing campaign
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continued momentum in developed markets, led by North  America which grew net operating revenues by 4%
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Delivered over $600 million in productivity, which drove operating  margin expansion
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Remained committed and consumer-focused in developing and emerging markets amidst persistent macroeconomic pressures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strengthened our global bottling system for the long term  with strategic actions taken in North America, Latin America,  Europe, Africa and Asia
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Introduced 500+ new products into the market worldwide,  including the successful launch of smartwater and Honest Tea in  Western Europe
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On track to complete refranchising of our Company-owned  bottling operations in the U.S. by the end of 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors (the Board) of The Coca-Cola Company (the Company) is furnishing you this Proxy Statement to solicit proxies on its  behalf to be voted at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareowners of The Coca-Cola Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting will be held at World of Coca-Cola,  121 Baker Street NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30313 on April 26, 2017, at 8:30 a.m., local time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxies also may be voted at any adjournments  or postponements of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The mailing address of our principal executive offices is The Coca-Cola Company, P.O. Box 1734, Atlanta, Georgia 30301.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are first furnishing  the proxy materials to shareowners on March 9, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All properly executed written proxies and all properly completed proxies submitted by telephone or Internet that are delivered pursuant to this  solicitation will be voted at the meeting in accordance with the directions given in the proxy, unless the proxy is revoked prior to completion  of voting at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only owners of record of shares of common stock of the Company (Common Stock) as of the close of business on February 27, 2017, the  record date, are entitled to notice of, and to vote at, the meeting or at any adjournments or postponements of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each owner of  record on the record date is entitled to one vote for each share of Common Stock held by such shareowner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement 12 12
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Message from Sam Nunn, Lead Independent Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As outlined in the Board letter beginning on page 2, your Board is overseeing a CEO leadership transition for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This work is perhaps the most important responsibility the Board has to our shareowners, and I assure you that we are committed to seeing an orderly and seamless management succession.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have been fortunate to have Muhtar Kent as our CEO for the past eight years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has shown visionary leadership with a clear focus on the long-term health of this  business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this regard, he has refocused the Company on its core business model  of building strong global brands, enhancing sustainable customer value and leading  a strong, dedicated franchise system.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Along the way, Muhtar continued to deliver  increased value to you, the shareowners, through continued annual increases in  dividends and growth in the Companys share price.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I appreciate the trust you   place in me as your Lead  Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On May 1, the new leadership structure will become effective.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: James Quincey w ill succeed Muhtar as our CEO, Muhtar will continue  as the Chairman of the Board, and I will continue to serve as your Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, James has been nominated  for election as a Director at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Board Leadership Structure beginning on page 26.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we make decisions about the Boards leadership structure, we do so within a governance framework that provides the Board  flexibility to select the best structure based on the specific needs of the business at the time and what we believe is in the best interests  of shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I join with all of my fellow Board members in a shared commitment to strong independent Board leadership and a commitment to good  corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To that end, at least one executive session of the non-employee Directors each year will continue to  include a review of the Boards leadership structure and whether the position of Chairman of the Board should be held by the Chief Executive Officer or separated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A continuing focus of mine as Lead Independent Director is ensuring the Directors have practical, hands-on experiences to help deepen  our understanding of the business and also of the key leaders who run the business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has continued to facilitate market  visits for the Directors as a way for us to see how the strategy that we discuss in the boardroom comes to life in the field.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the last two  years, Directors have visited Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, China, France, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Panama, Russia, South Africa, Spain,  the UK, as well as operations in the U.S.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also believe that, as Directors, we should help move this business forward in ways that we may be uniquely able to do.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year,  we implemented innovation awards that come directly from the Board and recognize each year Company associates who lead  innovation initiatives throughout the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I will note that the idea for this award originated from feedback provided during our Board  self-evaluation process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finally, as I reported to you last year, we continue to conduct a robust Board evaluation process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is a point of interest among many of our investors who have said that a robust evaluation process is an essential component of Board effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We agree.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee on Directors and Corporate Governance oversees our annual multi-step evaluation process, which provides Directors  an opportunity to assess the Board and Board committees and conduct a self-assessment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We remain committed to incorporating  evaluation best practices and enhancing our disclosure to demonstrate how the process works.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See page 15 for a description of our  current evaluation process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We look forward to continued engagement with shareowners on this important topic.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I appreciate the trust you place in me as your Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I commit to you that your Board will continue to promote the long-term interests of shareowners and remains accountable to you through a variety of good governance practices, which are evolving based on shareowner input.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I encourage you to review the following Governance section to learn more.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sam Nunn
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and the Committee on Directors and Corporate Governance  believe there are general qualifications that all Directors must exhibit  and other key qualifications and experience that should be represented  on the Board as a whole, but not necessarily by each Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board does not have a specific diversity policy, but considers  diversity of race, ethnicity, gender, age, cultural background  and professional experience in evaluating candidates for Board  membership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Diversity is important because the Board believes that  a variety of points of view contributes to a more effective decision- making process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When recommending Director nominees for  election by shareowners, the Board and the Committee on Directors  and Corporate Governance focus on how the experience and skill  set of each Director nominee complements those of fellow Director  nominees to create a balanced Board with diverse viewpoints and  deep expertise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Qualifications Required of All Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and the Committee on Directors and Corporate Governance  require that each Director be a recognized person of high integrity with  a proven record of success in his or her field and have the ability to  devote the time and effort necessary to fulfill his or her responsibilities  to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Director must demonstrate innovative thinking,  familiarity with and respect for corporate governance requirements  and practices, an appreciation of multiple cultures and a commitment  to sustainability and to dealing responsibly with social issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In  addition, the Board conducts interviews of potential Director candidates  to assess intangible qualities, including the individuals ability to ask  difficult questions and, simultaneously, to work collegially.

sentences.text: Director Nominee Selection Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee on Directors and Corporate Governance is responsible  for recommending to the Board a slate of nominees for election at  each Annual Meeting of Shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominees may be suggested  by Directors, members of management, shareowners or, in some  cases, by a third-party firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: mail to the Committee on Directors and Corporate Governance in care  of the Office of the Secretary, The Coca-Cola Company, P.O. Box 1734,  Atlanta, Georgia 30301, by e-mail to asktheboard@coca-cola.com  or by fax to (404) 676-8409.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recommendations by shareowners  that are made in accordance with these procedures will receive the  same consideration by the Committee on Directors and Corporate  Governance as other suggested nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee on Directors and Corporate Governance considers a  wide range of factors when assessing potential Director nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This  assessment includes a review of the potential nominees judgment,  experience, independence, understanding of the Companys business  or other related industries and such other factors as the Committee  concludes are pertinent in light of the current needs of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A potential nominees qualifications are considered to determine  whether they meet the qualifications required of all Directors and the  key qualifications and experience to be represented on the Board, as  described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, the Committee on Directors and Corporate  Governance assesses how each potential nominee would impact  the skills and experience represented on the Board as a whole in  the context of the Boards overall composition and the Companys  current and future needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareowner-Nominated Director Candidates
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2015, our Board adopted a Proxy Access for Director Nominations  bylaw after engaging with a number of our shareowners to understand  their views on the desirability of proxy access and the appropriate proxy  access structure for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy access bylaw permits  a shareowner, or a group of up to 20 shareowners, owning 3% or  more of the Companys outstanding Common Stock continuously for  at least three years to nominate and include in the Companys proxy  materials Director nominees constituting up to two individuals or 20% of  the Board (whichever is greater), provided that the shareowner(s) and  the nominee(s) satisfy the requirements specified in Article I, Section  12 of our By-Laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See question 31 on page 90 for more information.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Elections of Directors; Majority Voting Standard
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are elected each year, at the Annual Meeting of Shareowners,  to hold office until the next annual meeting and until their successors  are elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because term limits may cause the loss  of experience and expertise important to the optimal operation of  the Board, there are no limits on the number of terms a Director  may serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Committee on Directors and Corporate  Governance evaluates the qualifications and performance of each  incumbent Director before recommending the nomination of that  Director for an additional term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our By-Laws provide that, in an election of Directors where the  number of nominees does not exceed the number of Directors  to be elected, each Director must receive the majority of the votes  cast with respect to that Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a Director does not receive a  majority vote, he or she has agreed that a letter of resignation will be  submitted to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee on Directors and Corporate  Governance will make a recommendation to the Board on whether  to accept or reject the resignation, or whether other action should  be taken.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will act on the resignation taking into account  the recommendation of the Committee on Directors and Corporate  Governance, which will include consideration of the vote and any  relevant input from shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will publicly disclose its  decision and its rationale within 100 days of the certification of the  election results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director who tenders his or her resignation will  not participate in the decisions of the Committee on Directors and  Corporate Governance or the Board that concern the resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, pursuant to our Corporate Governance Guidelines, Directors  whose job responsibilities change or who reach the age of 74 are  asked to submit a letter of resignation to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These letters  are considered by the Board and, if applicable, annually thereafter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board oversees and monitors strategic planning

sentences.text: Business strategy is a key focus at the Board level and  embedded in the work of Board committees.

sentences.text: Board committees, which meet regularly and report back to  the full Board, play significant roles in carrying out the risk  oversight function.

sentences.text: Oversight of Strategy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversight of Risk
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strategic planning and oversight of the Companys business strategy  is a key responsibility of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that overseeing  and monitoring strategy is a continuous process and takes a multi- layered approach in exercising its duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board dedicates one  meeting each year to focus on business strategy and elements of  strategy are addressed in every Board meeting and embedded in  the work of Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This ongoing effort enables the Board  to focus on Company performance over the short, intermediate  and long term, as well as the quality of operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to  financial and operational performance, non-financial measures,  including sustainability efforts, are discussed regularly by the Board  and Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Inherent in the Boards responsibilities is an understanding and  oversight of the various risks facing the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board does not  view risk in isolation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risks are considered in virtually every business  decision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recognizes that it is neither possible nor prudent  to eliminate all risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Indeed, purposeful and appropriate risk taking is  essential for the Company to be competitive on a global basis and  to achieve the Companys long-term strategic objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective  risk oversight is an important priority of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has  implemented a risk governance framework designed to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: understand critical risks in the Companys business and strategy;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: allocate responsibilities for risk oversight among the full Board and its committees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Board and its committees oversee strategic planning,  Company management is charged with executing the business  strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To monitor performance against the Companys strategic  goals, the Board receives regular updates and actively engages  in dialogue with our Companys senior leaders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These boardroom  discussions are enhanced with hands-on experiences, such as  market visits, which provide Directors an opportunity to see strategy  execution first hand.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: evaluate the Companys risk management processes and whether  they are functioning adequately;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: facilitate open communication between management and  Directors; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: foster an appropriate culture of integrity and risk awareness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company believes that its Board leadership structure supports  the risk oversight function of the Board (see page 26).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board  implements its risk oversight function both as a whole and through  delegation to Board committees, which meet regularly and report  back to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Committees beginning on page 28 includes  a summary of the risk oversight focus area of the committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards oversight and managements execution of business  strategy are viewed with a long-term mindset and a focus on  assessing both opportunities for and potential risks to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board and Committee Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Board and its committees oversee risk management,  Company management is charged with managing risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company  has robust internal processes and an effective internal control  environment that facilitate the identification and management of  risks and regular communication with the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These include an  enterprise risk management program, a Risk Council and Risk Steering  Committee under the leadership of the Chief Financial Officer and  Chief Operating Officer, regular internal management Disclosure  Committee meetings, Codes of Business Conduct, robust product  quality standards and processes, a strong Legal Department and  Ethics and Compliance Office, and a comprehensive internal and  external audit process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and the Audit Committee monitor  and oversee the evaluation of the effectiveness of the internal controls
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and the risk management program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management communicates  routinely with the Board, Board committees and individual Directors  on the significant risks identified and how they are being managed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are free to, and indeed often do, communicate directly with  senior management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To learn more about risks facing the Company, you can review the  factors included in Part I, Item 1A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk Factors in the Annual Report  on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016 (the Form 10-K).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The risks described in the Form 10-K are not the only risks facing the  Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional risks and uncertainties not currently known or  that may currently be deemed to be immaterial also may materially  adversely affect the Companys business, financial condition or results  of operations in future periods.

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys governance framework provides the Board with  flexibility to select the appropriate Board leadership structure for the  Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making leadership structure determinations, the Board  considers many factors, including the specific needs of the business  and what is in the best interests of the Companys shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, a combined Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive  Officer helps facilitate timely and unfiltered communication with  the Board on critical business issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also believes that  there are benefits when having the same person represent both  the Company and the Board throughout the world with bottlers,  customers, consumers and other stakeholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Having the flexibility to select the appropriate structure based on the  specific needs of the business is critical, and it is part of the judgment  the Board believes it should exercise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board understands that  Board leadership structure is an important topic for many shareowners,  and the Board takes shareowner feedback into account when making  determinations around Board leadership structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Importantly, all Directors play an active role in overseeing the  Companys business both at the Board and committee levels.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As  part of each regularly scheduled Board meeting, the non-employee  Directors meet in executive session without the Chief Executive Officer  present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These meetings allow non-employee Directors to discuss  issues of importance to the Company, including the business and  affairs of the Company as well as matters concerning management,  without any member of management present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the  independent Directors meet in executive session several times a  year at regularly scheduled Board meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Details and Rationale  Current Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our current Board leadership structure comprises a combined  Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer, a Lead Independent  Director, Board committees led primarily by independent Directors  and active engagement by all Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Details and Rationale  New Structure in  Connection with CEO Transition
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The duties and responsibilities of the Chairman of the Board, the Lead  Independent Director and the Chief Executive Officer are described  in the table below and are set forth in the Companys By-Laws and  Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In December 2016, the Board decided to split the Chairman of  the Board and Chief Executive Officer roles when they appointed  James Quincey to succeed Muhtar Kent as Chief Executive Officer,  effective May 1, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of the Chief Executive Officer transition,  Mr. Kent will continue as Chairman of the Board of Directors and  Mr. Quincey has been nominated for election as a Director at the  2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sam Nunn will continue to serve as the Lead  Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since Mr. Kent took on the combined Chairman of the Board and  Chief Executive Officer role in 2009, the Board has been satisfied that  having one person in the combined role provides certain synergies  and efficiencies that enhance the functioning of the Board and  serve the business and shareowners well over time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys  business is complex and its products are sold in more than 200  countries around the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Most of the Companys products are  manufactured and sold by independent bottling partners throughout  the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This franchise structure requires the Chief Executive Officer  to maintain strong, hands-on relationships with the leaders of the  bottlers wherever they exist and to be close to the many facets of  the business existing in so many places in the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because the  Chief Executive Officer is the Board member closest to our complex  business, he is best able to identify many of the business issues that  need to be on the Board agenda, and, as Chairman of the Board, he  can focus Directors attention on the most critical business matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As noted above, the Board has flexibility to choose a different Board  leadership structure if and when it believes circumstances so warrant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that instituting an orderly transition period while  continuing the partnership between Mr. Kent and Mr. Quincey,  with an adjusted focus for each, will enable both executives to  apply their strongest skills to continuing the sustained growth of  our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Quincey, as Chief Executive Officer, will assume  complete accountability for the Companys strategic direction and  operations, and Mr. Kent, as Chairman of the Board, will lead the  Board and focus on governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement 26 26
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareowner feedback from this engagement is considered by the  Board and reflected in enhancements to policies and practices.

sentences.text: Our Board believes that shareowners should have line of sight into  decisions made in the boardroom.

sentences.text: Public Policy Engagement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We participate in public policy discussions on issues related to our  industry and business priorities, our more than 700,000 system  associates, our shareowners and the communities we serve.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional information about our public policy  engagement efforts, including our political contributions policy and  a report of U.S. political contributions from our Company and from  associate-funded programs, which include The Coca-Cola Company  Nonpartisan Committee for Good Government and various other  state political action committees, can be viewed on our Company  website, www.coca-colacompany.com, by clicking on Investors  and then Public Policy Engagement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the U.S., our Company and our affiliated political action committees  comply with applicable laws and other requirements regarding  contributions to political organizations; candidates for federal,  state and local public office; ballot measure campaigns; political  action committees; and trade associations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We engage with these  organizations and individuals to make our views clear and uphold our  commitment to help support the communities in which we operate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We base our U.S. political contributions on many considerations,  supporting candidates whose priorities align with those of our  Company when it comes to core issues that affect our business.

sentences.text: Sustainability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are committed to integrating sustainability into our everyday  actions to help create value for shareowners and the communities  in which we operate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In everything we do, we aim to strengthen the  foundations of our business and the communities we serve so that all
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: thrive long into the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our approach to sustainability is guided by  our shared vision for how we strive to create social value and make a  positive difference for the communities we serve through enhancing  peoples well-being, building stronger communities and working

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to protect the environment we all share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe the majority of  innovation over the next decade will happen at the intersection of  sustainability and the supply chain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Working collaboratively with  our bottling partners, we share best practices and knowledge to  better manage water resources and we partner at every stage of  our value chain, from ingredient sourcing to packaging recovery, to  build business resiliency and add value across our system, enabling  the economic empowerment of women along the way.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our pay-for-performance philosophy awards executives  in a way that motivates them to operate the Companys business in  a profitable and sustainable manner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To learn more about the Companys sustainability efforts, including  our comprehensive sustainability commitments, please view our  2015/2016 Sustainability Report on the Companys website, by visiting  www.coca-colacompany.com/sustainability.

sentences.text: Anti-Hedging, Anti-Short Sale and Anti-Pledging Policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys anti-hedging policy prohibits Directors, the Companys  executive officers and other designated employees from purchasing  any financial instrument that is designed to hedge or offset any  decrease in the market value of the Companys Common Stock,  including prepaid variable forward contracts, equity swaps, collars  and exchange funds.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors, the Companys executive officers  and other designated employees are also prohibited from engaging  in short sales related to the Companys Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All other  employees are discouraged from entering into hedging transactions  and engaging in short sales related to Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys anti-pledging policy discourages any pledging of  the Companys Common Stock, including holding Common Stock  in a margin account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Directors and the Companys  executive officers are required to obtain pre-approval from the  Companys General Counsel before pledging shares of Common  Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such approval will be granted only if the individual can clearly  demonstrate the financial capacity to repay the loan without resorting  to the pledged securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR INDEPENDENCE AND RELATED PERSON  TRANSACTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independence Determinations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the corporate governance listing standards of the NYSE and  the Companys Corporate Governance Guidelines, the Board must  consist of a majority of independent Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making independence  determinations, the Board observes NYSE and Securities and Exchange  Commission (SEC) criteria and considers all relevant facts and  circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under NYSE corporate governance listing standards,  to be considered independent:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Board must affirmatively determine that the Director otherwise  has no material relationship with the Company directly, or  as an officer, shareowner or partner of an organization that  has a relationship with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To aid in the Director  independence assessment process, the Board has adopted  categorical standards that identify categories of relationships  that the Board has determined would not affect a Directors  independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These categorical standards, which are part of  the Companys Corporate Governance Guidelines, are described  below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Director must not have a disqualifying relationship, as defined  in the NYSE standards; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Categorical Standards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following will not be considered material relationships that would impair a Directors independence:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Immaterial Sales/Purchases The Director is an executive officer or employee or any member of his or her immediate family is an executive officer  of any other organization that does business with the Company and the annual sales to, or purchases from, the  Company are less than $1 million or 1% of the consolidated gross revenues of such organization, whichever is more.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Immaterial Indebtedness The Director or any member of his or her immediate family is an executive officer of any other organization which  is indebted to the Company, or to which the Company is indebted, and the total amount of either companys  indebtedness to the other is less than $1 million or 1% of the total consolidated assets of the organization on which  the Director or any member of his or her immediate family serves as an executive officer, whichever is more.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Immaterial Position The Director is a director or trustee, but not an executive officer, or any member of his or her immediate family is  a director, trustee or employee, but not an executive officer, of any other organization (other than the Companys  outside auditing firm) that does business with, or receives donations from, the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Immaterial Ownership The Director or any member of his or her immediate family holds a less than 10% interest in any other organization  that has a relationship with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Immaterial Nonprofit Relationship The Director or any member of his or her immediate family serves as an executive officer of a charitable or  educational organization which receives contributions from the Company in a single fiscal year of less than $1 million or 2% of that organizations consolidated gross revenues, whichever is more.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, when determining Director independence, the Board  does not consider transactions:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: any immediate family member of any of the persons referenced  in the preceding two bullets, which means any child, stepchild,  parent, stepparent, spouse, sibling, mother-in-law, father-in-law,  son-in-law, daughter-in-law, brother-in-law or sister-in-law of the  Director, nominee for Director, executive officer or more than 5%  beneficial owner of Common Stock, and any person (other than  a tenant or employee) sharing the household of such Director,  nominee for Director, executive officer or more than 5% beneficial  owner of Common Stock; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: any firm, corporation or other entity in which any of the foregoing  persons is a partner or principal or in a similar position or in which  such person has a 10% or greater beneficial ownership interest.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: any person who is, or at any time during the applicable period  was, a Director of the Company or a nominee for Director or an  executive officer;

sentences.text: GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence and Related Person Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, the Company will enter into or ratify Related Person  Transactions only when the Board, acting through the Committee on  Directors and Corporate Governance, determines that the Related  Person Transaction is reasonable and fair to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When  considering whether a Related Person Transaction is reasonable and  fair to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee considers, among other things,  the evaluation of the transaction by employees directly involved and  the recommendation of the Chief Financial Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, any  Related Person Transaction involving an executive officer must be  pre-approved by the Chief Executive Officer and any Related Person  Transaction involving the Chief Executive Officer or a beneficial owner  of more than 5% of the outstanding Common Stock must be submitted  to the Audit Committee for approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Details regarding Related Person Transactions are included in  the charters for the Committee on Directors and Corporate  Governance and the Audit Committee and in our Codes of Business  Conduct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These documents can be found on the Companys website,  www.coca-colacompany.com, by clicking on Investors and then  clicking on Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain Related Person Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board, acting through the Committee on Directors and Corporate  Governance, believes that the following related person transactions  are reasonable and fair to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Herbert A. Allen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Herbert A. Allen, one of our Directors, is President,  Chief Executive Officer and a Director of Allen & Company Incorporated  (ACI) and a principal shareowner of ACIs parent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ACI is an indirect  equity holder of Allen & Company LLC (ACL).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many transactions that constitute Related Person Transactions are  ongoing and some arrangements predate any relationship with the  Director or predate the Directors relationship with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When  a transaction is ongoing, any amendments or changes are reviewed  and the transaction is reviewed annually for reasonableness and  fairness to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ACI has leased and subleased office space since 1977 in a building  owned by one of our subsidiaries and located in New York City.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ACI  was a tenant prior to the subsidiarys acquisition of the building.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In  June 2005, ACI assigned the lease and sublease to ACL.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In November  2015, the lease was renewed for a term of approximately 18 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, ACL paid approximately $1.1 million in rent and related  expenses, which included a rent abatement for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the opinion  of management, the terms of the lease are fair and reasonable and  as favorable to the Company as those that could have been obtained  from unrelated third parties at the time of the execution of the lease.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Identifying possible Related Person Transactions involves the following  procedures:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors, executive officers and beneficial owners of more than  5% of the outstanding Common Stock are asked to complete  customary annual questionnaires.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors and Director nominees are required to annually verify and  update information about
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) where the Director is an employee,  director or executive officer,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) each entity where an immediate  family member of a Director is an executive officer,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) each firm,  corporation or other entity in which the Director or an immediate  family member is a partner or principal or in a similar position or  in which such person has a 5% or greater beneficial ownership  interest and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) each charitable or educational organization where  the Director or an immediate family member is an employee,  executive officer, director or trustee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Howard G. Buffett and Berkshire Hathaway.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The father of Howard G. Buffett, one of our Directors, is Warren E. Buffett, the Chairman of the Board, Chief Executive Officer and major stockholder of Berkshire Hathaway.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Berkshire Hathaways holdings constituted 9.32% of the Companys outstanding Common Stock as of February 27, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Berkshire Hathaway Specialty Insurance Company (BHSI) is a wholly  owned subsidiary of Berkshire Hathaway.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In May 2016, the Company  and BHSI renewed a one-year insurance contract under which BHSI  provides two of the Companys subsidiaries with insurance covering  property on a primary basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Companys subsidiaries  paid an aggregate of approximately $183,000 to BHSI for insurance  coverage in the ordinary course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the Company receives the requested information from its  Directors (including nominees), executive officers and beneficial  owners of more than 5% of the outstanding Common Stock, the  Company compiles a list of all persons and entities, including all  subsidiaries of the entities identified, that may give rise to a Related  Person Transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Office of the Secretary reviews the updated  list and expands the list if necessary, based on a review of SEC filings,  Internet searches and applicable websites.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Burlington Northern Santa Fe, LLC (BNSF) is a wholly owned subsidiary  of Berkshire Hathaway.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Company paid BNSF approximately  $152,000 in demurrage fees in the ordinary course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Business Wire, Inc. (Business Wire) is a wholly owned subsidiary of  Berkshire Hathaway.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In July 2015, the Company and Business Wire  entered into a new three-year services agreement under which  Business Wire disseminates news releases for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016,  the Company paid approximately $228,000 to Business Wire in the  ordinary course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This business relationship was in place  prior to Berkshire Hathaways acquisition of Business Wire in 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the list of approximately 3,800 persons and entities was  distributed within the Company to identify any potential transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This list was also sent to each of the Companys approximately 400  accounting locations to be compared to payments and receipts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All  ongoing transactions, along with payment and receipt information,  were compiled for each person and entity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information was  reviewed and relevant information was presented to the Committee  on Directors and Corporate Governance or the Audit Committee,  as applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FlightSafety International Inc. (FlightSafety) is a wholly owned subsidiary of Berkshire Hathaway.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2014, the Company entered into a new five-year agreement with FlightSafety to provide pilot training services to the Company and a new three-year agreement with FlightSafety to provide flight attendant and mechanic training services to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Company entered into a new three-year agreement with FlightSafety to provide flight attendant and mechanic training services to the Company, which replaced the previous three-year agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Company paid FlightSafety approximately $616,000 for training services in the ordinary course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Berkshire Hathaway holds a significant equity interest in American  Express Company (together with its subsidiaries, American Express).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2013, the Company and American Express entered into a new  five-year agreement under which American Express provides global  credit card services to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, American Express paid  the Company approximately $1.4 million in rebates and incentives  under the terms of the agreement and in the ordinary course of  business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Company paid American Express fees of  approximately $817,000 for credit card memberships, business travel  and other services in the ordinary course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Berkshire Hathaway holds a significant equity interest in Moodys  Corporation (Moodys).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2012, the Company and a subsidiary  of Moodys entered into a two-year agreement for rating services  related to the Companys commercial paper programs and debt  offerings, which was renewed in 2015 for an additional two-year  period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Company paid a subsidiary of Moodys fees of  approximately $1.4 million for rating services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: International Dairy Queen, Inc. (IDQ) is a wholly owned subsidiary  of Berkshire Hathaway.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, IDQ and its subsidiaries received  promotional and marketing incentives from the Company totaling  approximately $3.4 million in the ordinary course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This  business relationship was in place for many years prior to Berkshire  Hathaways acquisition of IDQ.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: McLane Company, Inc. (McLane) is a wholly owned subsidiary  of Berkshire Hathaway.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, McLane and its subsidiaries paid  approximately $266 million to the Company to purchase fountain  syrup and other products in the ordinary course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also  in 2016, McLane and its subsidiaries received from the Company  approximately $13.1 million in agency commissions, marketing  payments and other fees relating to the sale of the Companys  products to customers in the ordinary course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This  business relationship was in place for many years prior to Berkshire  Hathaways acquisition of McLane in 2003.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Berkshire Hathaway holds a significant equity interest in Wells Fargo  & Company (together with its subsidiaries, Wells Fargo).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the  Company paid Wells Fargo approximately $399,000 for commercial  banking services in the ordinary course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the opinion of management, all of the relationships between the  Company and the entities affiliated with Berkshire Hathaway described  above are fair and reasonable and as favorable to the Company as  those that could have been obtained from unrelated third parties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Evan G. Greenberg.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Evan G. Greenberg is Chairman and Chief Executive  Officer of Chubb Limited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ACE Limited acquired The Chubb Corporation  in January 2016 and changed its name to Chubb Limited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to this  acquisition, Mr. Greenberg was Chairman and Chief Executive Officer  of ACE Limited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Chubb Limited, through its subsidiaries (collectively,  Chubb), has provided a broad range of insurance related products  and services to the Company and its subsidiaries since 1986.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During  2016, Chubb provided traditional insurance coverage where the  Company sought to transfer risk and fronting services where the  Company sought to retain risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, Chubb provided the  Company and its subsidiaries with insurance covering directors and  officers liability, employment practices liability, property and excess  liability on an excess basis, and insurance covering property, auto,  product recall, fiduciary liability, employed lawyers liability, cyber,  prize (hole in one) on a primary basis and an ERISA bond.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016,  the Company paid Chubb approximately $2.2 million for insurance  premiums and approximately $7.3 million in fronting fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the  opinion of management, the terms of the Companys insurance  coverage and fronting arrangements with Chubb were fair and  reasonable and as favorable to the Company as those that could  have been obtained from unrelated third parties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Company paid Display Technologies,  LLC approximately $4.4 million for shelving for in-store promotional  programs under a three-year supply agreement entered into in  February 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The term of this agreement has been extended to  December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Company paid 3Wire Group, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approximately $14.2 million for fountain equipment parts under a  2005 master agreement, which is renewed on an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These business relationships were in place for many years prior to  Marmons acquisition of these three entities and all payments were  made in the ordinary course of business.

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement    43
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: COMPENSATION Compensation Discussion and Analysis
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: COMPENSATION DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Message from the Compensation Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we have discussed in the last several proxy statements, the Compensation Committee has engaged in a multi-year process of  evaluating the Companys compensation programs and objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results of this evaluation have included redesigning the annual  and long-term incentive programs and adopting Equity Stewardship Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we did not make material changes to the  design of the compensation programs, but have taken important steps that we want to share with you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also want you to know what  is top of mind for this Committee now and going forward.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aligning compensation and strategy: Our Company is undergoing an important evolution to refocus on our core business model  of building strong global brands and leading a dedicated franchise bottling system.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company is taking clear strategic actions to  drive long-term growth for the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This transformation will cause the Company to look different, both financially and in terms of the  number of employees, as territories are refranchised to independent bottlers around the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the Companys strategy evolves,  so must our compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Committee will be focused on fostering a high-performance culture and continuing to  align pay and performance against the key strategic drivers of long-term growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Target setting: As we highlighted last year, the Compensation Committee enhanced the process by which we set performance goals and test the rigor of incentive targets and performance curves.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We devoted an additional in-person meeting in 2016 to this  topic, which will become an additional standing meeting each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See page 51 for additional information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of non-financial results in pay programs: We believe an important component of driving long-term value creation is considering  the broad range of our Companys stakeholders, including our shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While we believe the majority of incentive pay should  be based on financial metrics tied to our long-term business strategy, progress toward non-financial goals that are critical to our  business, including our sustainability focus areas, also adds value for our shareowners and other stakeholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have started  to take these areas into account in a more structured way in 2016 as part of the annual incentive program (see page 53) and will  continue to work on this concept in the coming years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will see in the rest of this Compensation Discussion & Analysis the details of our compensation programs, including the specific  decisions we made for the 2016 Named Executive Officers and the rationale for them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We remain committed to listen to your feedback  as we continue to refine and evaluate the Companys compensations programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maria Elena   Lagomasino Helene D.  Gayle Alexis M.  Herman
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Program Enhancements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over the last several years, we have made several key enhancements to our compensation programs to continue to improve the link between  compensation and the Companys business and talent strategies as well as the long-term interests of our shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Enhanced  how we set  and test the  rigor of incentive  targets Adopted Equity  Stewardship   Guidelines, substantially  decreasing the annual  burn rate and  overhang of our  equity plans Reduced the  maximum annual  incentive payout  from 300% to  250% of target Transitioned  long-term incentive  equity award mix from  60% stock options and  40% PSUs to 1/3 stock  options and 2/3 PSUs Added a relative   total shareowner   return metric in the  long-term incentive  program Adjusted annual  incentive metrics  consistent with our  business strategy,  including reducing  weighting on   volume
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
